vivae.ros.simulator.engine
Interface AgentRegisteringSimulation

All Superinterfaces:
ExternalSimulation, Simulation
All Known Implementing Classes:
VivaeSimulatorOne
public interface AgentRegisteringSimulation
extends Simulation

This simulation is able to spawn new agents and add them into the simulation. Currently only spawning agents BEFORE the simulation start is supported. Deleting agents also is not supported so far.

Method Summary
